data.title: How A Two-Day Plunge Wiped Out This Biotech's Coronavirus Gains
data.text: Moderna announced the pricing of its secondary offering Wednesday, sending MRNA stock into a two-day dive that wiped out gains from last week related to its coronavirus vaccine efforts.

data.title: Here's Why Moderna Slipped Lower Today
data.text: A secondary offering causes dilution for the biotech.

data.title: Is Moderna a Buy?
data.text: This mRNA vaccine developer has become a hot stock due to the coronavirus epidemic.
